Home.bannerText01: A konect, a link for your value
Home.bannerText02: An important tool for memorable connections, creating opportunities with each exchange of your value
Home.section01_01: Our PVC business cards are more than just a medium they are the innovative tool that turns every meeting into an opportunity for instant connection. In a simple exchange, discover a world where entrepreneurs and creative minds meet effortlessly, sharing ideas, projects and ambitions.
Home.section01_02: Join Konect and immerse yourself in a world where connections are forged naturally.
Home.index_vision_text: Become the reference platform for professional networking, where every connection turns into an opportunity thanks to intuitive technology and advanced network management tools.
Home.index_vision_section01: Less paper, more connections and less expense: adopt an environmentally friendly approach to networking while saving money by avoiding multiple papers to be printed all the time.
Home.index_vision_section02: Offer detailed analytics on interactions and connections to help users understand and optimize their network.
Home.index_vision_section03: Facilitate connections at events, conferences and professional meetings with instant contact exchanges.
Home.label_01: Networking taken to the next level

Kuser.you_too: You too, easily get your konect card

Plan.plan_text01: Choose the model that goes with your networking goals
Plan.plan_text03: Very effective for your personal branding
Plan.plan_text04: Enjoy all the power with a touch of extra gadget

Labels.take_control: Take control of your contact card very easily.

Organization.add_card_index_title: Create your organization and order a konect gadget for your team members
Organization.add_card_desc: Create your organization today and order Konect gadgets for each of your members, with ease and efficiency. With our intuitive platform, you can create a space dedicated to your organization, where you can manage Kgadgets requests for all your teams.

Kgadgets.white_card_desc: Simplify sharing your contact information with our white NFC card. Designed for ease of use, this compact card utilizes NFC technology to enable instant exchange of contact information. Slip it into your wallet or attach it to your bag to stay connected at all times.
Kgadgets.black_card_desc: Stylish and functional, our black NFC card is the perfect accessory for modern networking. With its bold color and advanced technology, this card allows you to share your contact information with style and simplicity. Perfect for image-conscious professionals and technology enthusiasts.
Kgadgets.white_ring_desc: Carry connectivity on your finger with our black NFC ring. Made of sturdy iron and equipped with integrated NFC technology, this ring allows you to exchange contact information with a simple tap. Perfect for those seeking an innovative approach to networking, this ring combines style and functionality.
Kgadgets.black_ring_desc: Assert your style while staying connected with our white NFC ring. Crafted from quality materials and equipped with advanced NFC technology, this ring allows you to share your contact information with ease and elegance. Perfect for those seeking a versatile accessory that combines fashion and utility.
